KeyVaultManagementClient KeyVaultManagementClient Class

In this Article

Edit

The Azure management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Azure Key Vault.

Syntax

public class KeyVaultManagementClient : ServiceClient<KeyVaultManagementClient>, IKeyVaultManagementClient, IDisposable, IAzureClientPublic Class KeyVaultManagementClient
